mapper.select: select concept_id , concept_name , domain_id , vocabulary_id , concept_class_id , standard_concept , concept_code , valid_start_date , valid_end_date , invalid_reason from concept where (concept_id like '%${searchKwd}%' or concept_name like '%${searchKwd}%') order by concept_id asc limit #{viewCnt} offset (#{pageCnt} - 1) * 10
